column4: does ifconfig show that the interface has an address? Perhaps it is not getting dns info
There's two parts to ifconfig, yes? Under lo, it lists inet addr:127.0.0.1  Also, I set up OpenDNS, and it shows it under Network Settings.
There should be an probably be an eth0 if it is a wired interface in the output of ifconfig. What are the contents of /etc/resolv.conf ?
Yes, there is also an eth0 in the output of ifconfig. No address there, though. /etc/resolv.conf has nameserver 208.67.222.222 nameserver 208.67.220.220
